phrases: Let me think, I suppose she was around 11 when she became humanity's first Kamitsuki.
You stay young when you turn into a Kamitsuki, do not you?
The heart can also age, Highness.
Your godmother's name is also Renbokoji.
Tell me, when did you and the others receive the Blessing?
At the time, we called it a curse.
No sign of Valvraves or passengers.
No sign of Valvraves or passengers.
At present, local army forces are setting up a dragnet.
A thorough search is being conducted, but they have not been located yet.
We are dealing with the Valvraves here.
They are too much for regional forces to handle.
But sir, we may be on Earth, but we are the space navy.
I understand that this is their turf.
We will simply offer helpful suggestions.
I have to say, they picked an interesting spot to come down in.
We came down out in the boonies, that is all.
I am just glad it is not snowing.
Our entry angle was just 0.2 degrees off, and we end up way out here...
I cannot believe we landed right in the middle of enemy territory.
We are here to pound the crap out of Dorssia, anyway.
It sounds like this fool still does not understand what force reconnaissance means.
- What did you say?! - Get it into your head already!
We landed in the enemy's lap.
We got no choice but to fight now, you know?
You have got a one-track mind.
This is no time to be fighting among ourselves.
Right now, we have to think of a way to reach JIOR from here.
I wonder just how far away it is.
Um... L-elf is thinking of one.
We are turning to him again?
He is one of us now.
He is saved our lives on a bunch of occasions up until now, right?
The objective of this operation is to procure a means of transport.
So where do we get this means of transport?
Sure, a military transport would be able to carry the Valvraves, but still...
But compared to a consumer product, its performance would be a lot better.
You make it sound easy, but how do we do it?
We send spies into the enemy ranks.
This team will be Saki Rukino and Akira Renbokoji.
We cannot send Akira-chan in undercover!
It is because they do not feel protective about you.
In terms of skill set, it would be difficult for anyone else.
Stop it, Akira is not ready to
Look, I am happy that you want to do this for your big brother, Akira,
Do you think this will fool the Dorssians?
Cobbling together a bunch of spare parts to look like a Valvrave is crazy.
L-elf said it just has to put doubt in their minds.
The goal is to buy time.
There is a call from the ARUS Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
They say that the five Valvraves came down in Dorssian territory, not JIOR.
They want to know where their friends came down.
As we thought, they do not appear to have any means of contacting the Valvraves.
Although the dimensions and mass of the
Valvrave spotted at Module 77 match the Figaro Report,
the probability that it is a fake seems to be quite high.
Let us play along and pretend to be fooled by it.
If there are other Valvraves at Module 77, it will probably put pressure on Dorssia.
We will word it as the government confirming a civilian news organization scoop.
I will have a draft prepared right away.
What plans are they setting in motion?
We are really taking her with us?
I have already confirmed that this leads to the surface up ahead.
Take a close look a the layout, everyone.
Drill L-elf's plan into your heads.
Do not worry, they do not go off that easily.
Well, they can be triggered to go off really easily, though.
Okay, I see what he is doing.
Sorry, could you hand me a screwdriver?
Um, I just need a screwdriver...
You know, I did not expect you to come with us, Marie.
He said that you volunteered to come to Earth.
That is because I thought that if I came down to Earth, I might remember.
I heard that you were the one who proposed this operation, Haruto.
What made you decide to go to Earth?
There is a lot that I want to know.
In addition to the situation in JIOR?
About the Valvraves, about the reason for this war, and... about myself.
Like they say, an army marches on its stomach.
People in the past had some good sayings.
There is still some curry-flavored left.
Are you sure I can have it?
I am amazed that you found this path, Q-vier.
Say, X. Can I shoot him?
The sound of a gunshot would carry a long way here.
It has not changed at all since then.
Wow, people actually live in a place like this...
The pride of the Dorssian army, the Ideal Blume mobile base weapon.
It establishes a bridgehead by making assault landings inside enemy lines.
It is a revolutionary weapon that made the Third Blitz War possible.
That is what attacked the JIOR mainland?
Um... I forget, how do you say Hello?
It really has not changed, not one bit.
You must work for the Karlstein Agency.
It may look like a typical settlement, but it is actually a top-secret facility that trains Dorssian agents.
We were told to kill anyone suspicious.
I-I am fine, so do not come out yet...
If we did not kill them, we would be killed.
I explained it back at the Moon, remember?
Wounds heal up in no time.
We are proceeding to the next step right away.
Those kids, did you kill them?
Body-jack these two and infiltrate the Dorssian army.
I will see you on the surface.
There should be a record of the monitor feed in the cockpit.
If I look at that, I will know for sure if I was imagining things.
It is been a long time!
How do you know my name?
This is not the real me.
What is important is that you and I are friends.
Your goal is to lure the enemy force to this hill.
When they arrive at the hill, we collapse the ground beneath them using the bombs we planted.
Ah, we will knock them down into that cave.
Your job is to infiltrate the Dorssian army in all the confusion and hack the transport ship from the inside.
From oh-three-hundred last night until the present, did any of you detect anything out of the ordinary?
I observed unusual activity on the hill to the north.
Judging from the language two of them used, I believe them to be JIORan.
Just what I would expect from a Karlstein boy.
You can lead us there, I take it?
We will head for the north hill at once.
Hey, did one of them have silver hair?
These two are L-elf's old squadmates!
We will go strictly in the capacity of observers.
In the event of an engagement, command authority rests with you.
He has silver hair and a real nasty look in his eyes.
I do not believe he was there.
Those questions fall under our purview as well.
You remember me from 5 years ago?
My only memories are of the past two years.
Do you know the old me?
It is because I ate Runes.
Your objective is to destroy the Blume.
I am going to do this with gusto!
Man, the firepower on that thing!
If I fly, my temperature's going to spike!
That is the Ideal Blume, the Dorssian army's most powerful weapon.
They had another one hidden, huh?
The Blume's downward fire offers unparalleled power against land combat weapons with thin top armor plating,
but Unit 5 can focus all its defensive capabilities overhead.
I cannot believe this thing's defenses!
With the arrival of the Valvraves, you are already a weapon of the past.
Yeah, since we are going in turns.
You... were talking with the Valvrave just now, were not you?
Your right eye was injured during reentry, and it healed.
When we got to Earth, your eye was healed.
You and me were more than enough for the job!
I have never seen that type before.
They all look the same after you shoot'them down.
Proceeding to aircraft operational test phase 4.
I am going to ask you one more time.
When Dorssia came to Module 77, I was...
Get into your Valvrave, Haruto Tokishima!
Kirchbaums, you are cleared to proceed.
We do not have any intel on these!
If the secret of the Kamitsuki got out, this combat group would no longer be viable.
Violence is your answer for everything!
Next time, episode 16, Marie Set Free.
The system that will expose the truth of the world.
